short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically endorse your connections' skills on LinkedIn. Catching their attention and nurturing your relationship.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically endorse a list of LinkedIn users for their top skills.
Endorse skills of your contacts in bulk, Boost your profile credibility by getting endorsements back.

🔥 FEATURES
✓ Auto Endorse Skills
✓ Import profile link from CSV file
✓ Continue task progresss on the history page
✓ Receive free updates continuously

👋 FAQ
If you have any questions, please contact us at help@niomaker.com.

🔒 DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed on your local computer, without passing through our web server, ensuring the privacy of your information.
